original_title: Lanka IOC contributes Rs.200mn to President’s Fund
original_body_lines: During a recent visit of Lanka IOC PLC (LIOC) Chairman Sujoy Choudhury from India to Sri Lanka, the management of LIOC made a contribution of Rs.200 million to the President’s Fund, which was presented to President Ranil Wickremesinghe by Choudhury, in the presence of LIOC Managing Director Dipak Das.

The proceeds of this fund are being utilised by the government of Sri Lanka for benevolent purposes such as medical assistance, education and scholarship programmes, welfare activities, religious activities, sports and arts and cultural activities.

LIOC, being a responsible corporate citizen, has been making regular donations, mainly focusing on education, healthcare, environment and community development, under the CSR activities of the company
